description: Number of living species which are recognised by science at present time on a global scale and have been described by a Linnean name. Estimates do not include fossil species.
name: species living

description: Number of extinct species which are recognised by science at present time on a global scale and have been described by a Linnean name. Estimates do not include living species.
name: species extinct

description: Number of living species which are estimated to exist on a global scale, including both already described and yet to be discovered species.
name: estimated species
